name: Dungeon of Karma
description:
Welcome to the Dungeon of Karma, where you build up karma and spend them for permanent upgrades in this roguelike random generated dungeon. Loot, shoot and slash your way through the dungeon to get to the boss room from multiple playthroughs.

Got inspiration from Binding of Isaac and Nuclear Throne.

Language: English

Game Features:
  • Top-down shooter
  • Roguelike
  • Random dungeon and rooms
  • Some looting
Notice:

The game is a project I made by myself for fun and is still on development. Although the first stage is basically done, things may change.
